pull.title: [travis] New travis job for CHECK_DOCS steps
pull.body:
Configure a new Travis job that runs against PRs, and only runs the `CHECK_DOC` tests. At the same time, the `CHECK_DOC` stuff in the existing job would be removed.

Fixes #11004

rename.from: [WIP][bitcoin-11004] New Travis job for CHECK_DOCS steps
rename.to: [WIP] New Travis job for CHECK_DOCS steps

events.body:
You wouldn't need to set environment variables that are not used for the
check doc. I.e. no need for the cross compile HOST ...

On Mon, May 7, 2018, 10:43 Grady Laksmono <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> *@glaksmono* commented on this pull request.
> ------------------------------
>
> In .travis.yml
> <https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13183#discussion_r186444769>:
>
> > @@ -84,3 +70,24 @@ script:
>  after_script:
>      - echo $TRAVIS_COMMIT_RANGE
>      - echo $TRAVIS_COMMIT_LOG
> +
> +jobs:
> +  include:
> +    - stage: CHECK_DOC
> +      env:
> +        - HOST=arm-linux-gnueabihf PACKAGES="g++-arm-linux-gnueabihf python3-pip shellcheck" DEP_OPTS="NO_QT=1" CHECK_DOC=1 GOAL="install" BITCOIN_CONFIG="--enable-glibc-back-compat --enable-reduce-exports"
>
> HOST=arm-linux-gnueabihf will be executed twice in the check_doc and test
> then?
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you commented.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13183#discussion_r186444769>, or mute
> the thread
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AGGmv2lQYTRAB2bg70MXl0ugLJVNhLGeks5twF2agaJpZM4T0v_5>
> .
>

rename.from: [WIP] New Travis job for CHECK_DOCS steps
rename.to: [travis] New travis job for CHECK_DOCS steps

events.body: Please squash your commits according to https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#squashing-commits

events.message: [bitcoin-11004] creating another jobs for the CHECK_DOC=1, separated from the core jobs

events.body: utACK 18c0b8430820114d14a15fe19b7ae86e62be17d8. Thanks for sticking with this. Indeed a very nice first contribution!
Thank you for all of the guidance @MarcoFalke

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -84,3 +70,24 @@ script:
 after_script:
     - echo $TRAVIS_COMMIT_RANGE
     - echo $TRAVIS_COMMIT_LOG
+
+jobs:
+  include:
+    - stage: CHECK_DOC
+      env:
+        - HOST=arm-linux-gnueabihf PACKAGES="g++-arm-linux-gnueabihf python3-pip shellcheck" DEP_OPTS="NO_QT=1" CHECK_DOC=1 GOAL="install" BITCOIN_CONFIG="--enable-glibc-back-compat --enable-reduce-exports"
comments.body:
Please keep the actual arm cross build intact. The only thing you'd need to move here is the pip and shellcheck package

Also, would be nice if the check doc run before the tests, not the other way round.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -84,3 +70,24 @@ script:
 after_script:
     - echo $TRAVIS_COMMIT_RANGE
     - echo $TRAVIS_COMMIT_LOG
+
+jobs:
+  include:
+    - stage: CHECK_DOC
+      env:
+        - HOST=arm-linux-gnueabihf PACKAGES="g++-arm-linux-gnueabihf python3-pip shellcheck" DEP_OPTS="NO_QT=1" CHECK_DOC=1 GOAL="install" BITCOIN_CONFIG="--enable-glibc-back-compat --enable-reduce-exports"
comments.body: `HOST=arm-linux-gnueabihf` will be executed twice in the `check_doc` and `test` then?

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -84,3 +75,27 @@ script:
 after_script:
     - echo $TRAVIS_COMMIT_RANGE
     - echo $TRAVIS_COMMIT_LOG
+
+jobs:
+  include:
+    - stage: check_doc
+      sudo: required
+      env:
+        - PACKAGES="python3-pip shellcheck" CHECK_DOC=1

@@ -22,7 +25,7 @@ env:
     - WINEDEBUG=fixme-all
   matrix:
 # ARM
-    - HOST=arm-linux-gnueabihf PACKAGES="g++-arm-linux-gnueabihf python3-pip shellcheck" DEP_OPTS="NO_QT=1" CHECK_DOC=1 GOAL="install" BITCOIN_CONFIG="--enable-glibc-back-compat --enable-reduce-exports"
+    - HOST=arm-linux-gnueabihf PACKAGES="g++-arm-linux-gnueabihf python3-pip shellcheck" DEP_OPTS="NO_QT=1" GOAL="install" BITCOIN_CONFIG="--enable-glibc-back-compat --enable-reduce-exports"
comments.body: can remove pip and shellcheck here

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -84,3 +75,27 @@ script:
 after_script:
     - echo $TRAVIS_COMMIT_RANGE
     - echo $TRAVIS_COMMIT_LOG
+
+jobs:
+  include:
+    - stage: check_doc
+      sudo: required
comments.body:
You can get rid of sudo here to speed up the boot-process:

```diff
diff --git a/.travis.yml b/.travis.yml
index f3f5305e4a..f547b3dc42 100644
--- a/.travis.yml
+++ b/.travis.yml
@@ -79,12 +79,13 @@ after_script:
 jobs:
   include:
     - stage: check_doc
-      sudo: required
-      env:
-        - PACKAGES="python3-pip shellcheck"
+      sudo: false
+      addons:
+       apt:
+        packages:
+         - python3-pip
+         - shellcheck
       install:
-        - if [ -n "$PACKAGES" ]; then travis_retry sudo apt-get update; fi
-        - if [ -n "$PACKAGES" ]; then travis_retry sudo apt-get install --no-install-recommends --no-upgrade -qq $PACKAGES; fi
         - if [ "$TRAVIS_EVENT_TYPE" = "pull_request" ]; then travis_retry pip3 install flake8 --user; fi
       before_script:
         - git fetch --unshallow

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -8,6 +8,9 @@ cache:
   - depends/built
   - depends/sdk-sources
   - $HOME/.ccache
+stages:
+  - check_doc
+  - test
 env:
   global:
     - MAKEJOBS=-j3
comments.body: Can remove the CHECK_DOC on the line below this one.
